sourcesContent:
import { StyledForm } from "./Form.js" import { Formik, Form as FormikForm, Field, ErrorMessage } from "formik" import * as Yup from "yup" const validationSchema = Yup.object({ name: Yup.string().required("Name is required").min(2, "Name is too short"), email: Yup.string().required("Email is required").email("Email is invalid"), phone: Yup.string("Invalid val2ue") .required("Phone is required") .typeError("Invalid value") .min(5, "Invalid value"), }) export default function Form() { return ( { console.log(values) resetForm() }} validationSchema={validationSchema} >
) }
